column4: I like Pidgin. I even made few changes in pixmaps to suit my taste a tad better. :)
Uh. You don't have to sync anything. A list of users usually comes with any IRC client. If Pidgin isn't showing it, try to enable it somewhere.
IRC does not embed smiley or img. >;}~
lsusb | grep -i bluetooth --> Does it display something?
Also, make sure the Wifi/BT switch is on.
No, it does not display. Does this mean that I don't have bluetooth?
You can get BT dongle for... few bucks. It is incredibly cheap.
But, I see over Google, that Compaq 6710s has Integrated and inbuilt Bluetooth, :(
That's not really useful. Even the user and the helpers seems to be skeptical. Furthurmore, my PC does not have BT and i have BT dongle for the said PC, it showed up in lsusb too.
